Question: This person flew the plane back to friendly territory, but due to the loss of the aileron, ejection was his only safe option.
Hints: This person then took part in Bob Hope's 1969 USO show, primarily to Vietnam.
The Space Foundation named this person as a recipient of its 2013 General James E Hill Lifetime Space Achievement Award.
The President spoke for about a minute, after which this person responded for about thirty seconds.
